name: NissanConnect-Actions
info:
This subflow sends http-requests to the
NissanConnect-Service. All of the commands initiates a connection to the car -  NissanConnect sends an SMS-Message to the car, and waits for the response. Therefore it takes a while until the date is send back to the NissanConnect-Service.

### Inputs
msg.command - one of the following:
 - "refresh-battery-status"
 - "hvac-start"
 - "hvac-stop"
 - "refresh-hvac-status"
 - "trip-history"
 - "refresh-location"
 - "charging-start"
 - "charging-stop"

msg.conf - the config object

msg.session - the session object

### Outputs

The message object contains the http-request response. The response is delayed for 20 seconds.

name: NissanConnect-Status
info:
This subflow sends http-requests to the
NissanConnect-Service, and stores the results
to the configure MQTT-Server. None of the requests initiates a "real-life"-connection to the car - it returns the last known data.

### Inputs
msg.command - one of the following:
 - "battery-status"
 - "hvac-status"
 - "location"
 - "trip-history"

msg.conf - the config object

msg.session - the session object

**Optional for "trip-history":**

msg.startDate - "YYYY-MM-DD"

msg.endDate - "YYYY-MM-DD"

msg.type:
 - 0 = daily
 - 1 = monthly
 - 2 = yearly

### Outputs

The message object contains the http-request response.

name: NissanConnect-Session
info:
This subflow authenticates against NissanConnect-Services and returns a session-Object (mainly the required Bearer-token)

### Inputs
This subflow requires a config-Object as msg.payload

### Outputs
The message.payload contains the session-object.

name: store Authid & prepare Request
Set Flow-Vars/Config
func:
var conf = {
  'client_id': 'a-ncb-nc-android-prod', // CLIENT_ID_V2_EU_PROD
  'client_secret': '6GKIax7fGT5yPHuNmWNVOc4q5POBw1WRSW39ubRA8WPBmQ7MOxhm75EsmKMKENem', // CLIENT_SECRET_V2_EU_PROD
  'scope': 'openid profile vehicles', // API_SCOPE_V2_EU_PROD
  'auth_base_url': 'https://prod.eu2.auth.kamereon.org/kauth/', // OAUTH_AUTHORIZATION_BASE_URL_V2_EU_PROD
  'realm': 'a-ncb-prod', // OAUTH_REALM_DEFAULT_V2_EU_PROD CLIENT_ID_V2_EU_PROD
  'redirect_uri': 'org.kamereon.service.nci:/oauth2redirect',
  'car_adapter_base_url': 'https://alliance-platform-caradapter-prod.apps.eu2.kamereon.io/car-adapter/',
  'user_adapter_base_url': 'https://alliance-platform-usersadapter-prod.apps.eu2.kamereon.io/user-adapter/',
  'user_base_url': 'https://nci-bff-web-prod.apps.eu2.kamereon.io/bff-web/', // bffWeb_eu_prod
  'api_version' : 'protocol=1.0,resource=2.1',
  'username' : 'change@user', // CHANGE ME
  'password' : 'ChangePassword',  // CHANGE ME
  'timeZoneOffset': '+01:00' //Berlin
}
flow.set('conf', conf);
return msg;

msg.payload = flow.get('conf');
return msg;

name: Store Session
func:
flow.set('session', msg.payload);
return msg;
